statements: SELECT * FROM attendance_records WHERE student_id = 123
SELECT student_id, attendance_status FROM attendance_records
SELECT * FROM attendance_records WHERE session_id = 456 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT DISTINCT student_id FROM attendance_records
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM attendance_records
SELECT student_id, session_id, attendance_status FROM attendance_records WHERE student_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT student_id) AS total_students, session_id FROM attendance_records GROUP BY session_id;
SELECT * FROM attendance_records WHERE attendance_status IN ('Present', 'Late') AND session_id = 456 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT session_id, COUNT(*) AS total_attendance FROM attendance_records GROUP BY session_id HAVING total_attendance > 10;
SELECT MAX(timestamp) AS last_attendance_time, attendance_status FROM attendance_records WHERE session_id = 789;
SELECT * FROM virtual_classroom_sessions;
SELECT session_id, session_date FROM virtual_classroom_sessions;
SELECT session_duration, session_date FROM virtual_classroom_sessions WHERE session_duration > 60;
SELECT * FROM attendance_records WHERE attendance_status = 'Present';
SELECT student_id, session_id FROM attendance_records ORDER BY session_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_classroom_sessions WHERE session_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY session_date DESC
SELECT session_id, session_duration FROM virtual_classroom_sessions WHERE session_duration > 60
SELECT session_id, COUNT(record_id) AS total_attendance FROM attendance_records GROUP BY session_id ORDER BY total_attendance DESC
SELECT * FROM attendance_records WHERE attendance_status = 'present' AND session_id IN (SELECT session_id FROM virtual_classroom_sessions WHERE session_date = '2022-12-15')
SELECT A.session_id, A.attendance_status, B.session_date FROM attendance_records A JOIN virtual_classroom_sessions B ON A.session_id = B.session_id ORDER BY B.session_date ASC
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT session_id, session_date, session_topic FROM classroom_sessions WHERE session_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT session_topic, session_date FROM classroom_sessions WHERE session_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_name LIKE 'M%';
SELECT session_topic, session_date FROM classroom_sessions ORDER BY session_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, attendance_status FROM students JOIN attendance_records ON students.student_id = attendance_records.student_id WHERE attendance_status = 'Present';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_name = 'Alice' OR student_name = 'Bob' AND student_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM Student;
SELECT student_name FROM Student ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Student WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Classroom WHERE classroom_name LIKE '%A%';
SELECT session_date, classroom_id FROM Session ORDER BY session_date ASC;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Student;
SELECT classroom_name, classroom_id FROM Classroom;
SELECT session_date, classroom_id FROM Session WHERE session_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, attendance_status FROM Student JOIN Attendance ON Student.student_id = Attendance.student_id;
SELECT * FROM Attendance WHERE attendance_status = 'Present';
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, student_id FROM students ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM attendance_records WHERE attendance_status = 'Present';
SELECT student_name, classroom_name FROM students JOIN virtual_classrooms ON students.student_id = virtual_classrooms.classroom_id;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, classroom_name FROM students, virtual_classrooms WHERE students.student_id = virtual_classrooms.classroom_id;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(*) AS attendance_count FROM attendance_records GROUP BY student_id ORDER BY attendance_count DESC;
SELECT student_name, attendance_status FROM students JOIN attendance_records ON students.student_id = attendance_records.student_id WHERE attendance_status = 'Present';
SELECT DISTINCT student_id, classroom_id FROM attendance_records WHERE session_date >= '2022-01-01' AND session_date <= '2022-12-31';
